post.title: Delicious Spaghetti Carbonara
post.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta. Simple yet elegant!
post.ingredients: 400g spaghetti, 200g pancetta, 4 eggs, 100g Pecorino Romano, black pepper
post.directions: 1. Cook pasta al dente. 2. Fry pancetta until crispy. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine everything off heat.

post.title: Healthy Quinoa Buddha Bowl
post.description: Nutritious and colorful bowl packed with vegetables, quinoa, and tahini dressing.
post.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, mixed vegetables, chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, olive oil
post.directions: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Roast vegetables. 3. Mix tahini dressing. 4. Assemble bowl.

post.title: Homemade Chocolate Chip Cookies
post.description: Soft, chewy chocolate chip cookies that are perfect for any occasion!
post.ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup butter, 1 cup brown sugar, 2 eggs, chocolate chips
post.directions: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and flour. 3. Fold in chocolate chips. 4. Bake at 375Â°F.

post.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
post.description: Fresh salmon grilled to perfection with a zesty lemon marinade.
post.ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, 2 lemons, olive oil, garlic, herbs
post.directions: 1. Marinate salmon in lemon and herbs. 2. Preheat grill. 3. Grill for 6-8 minutes per side.

post.title: Vegetarian Tacos
post.description: Delicious plant-based tacos with seasoned black beans and fresh vegetables.
post.ingredients: Black beans, corn tortillas, avocado, tomatoes, onions, cilantro, lime
post.directions: 1. Heat tortillas. 2. Season black beans. 3. Prepare toppings. 4. Assemble tacos.
